name: river pack -- sold out
description: Drawstring backpack with cotton rope straps. Unlined, and fully serged or featuring French seams for durability. Gold toned hardware. The pink cotton fabric is 1990s inspired and contains hidden flowers in shades of purple and blue. The bunny cotton fabric features bows and flowers on a pale blue background. The pink River Pack has double, thinner rope straps and the Summer Water label on the inside. The bunny River Pack has single, thicker rope straps and the Summer Water label on the outside. Backpack straps measure about 32 each when pack is full drawn. Bags measure about 13.5 inches square. Please spot clean or gently handwash in lukewarm water only. Also, please note that this item ships from Canada and may take 5-10 business days to arrive. For more photos, please see this set.

name: harbour tote -- sold out
description: Round-bottomed drawstring shoulder tote with cotton rope. Lined with natural-colour cotton canvas, and fully serged for durability. Gold toned hardware. This particular cotton print fabric was inspired by 1940s florals and is made up of delicate pastel colours. Shoulder strap is not adjustable and measures about 33 inches. Bag is about 11.5 inches from top to bottom, with an 8 inch diameter. Please spot clean or gently handwash in lukewarm water only. Also, please note that this item ships from Canada and may take 5-10 business days to arrive. For more photos, please see this set.
